channel.title: Cnydrones on Utica 3D printing
channel.description: Recent content in Cnydrones on Utica 3D printing

item.description: CNY Drones is the Central New York’s drones informational hub and volunteer group promoting STEM-based drone competitions, showcases, educational opportunities & safe practices.They have gathered the area’s drone authorities - agencies, officials, educators, manufacturers, clubs and enthusiasts to help organize the growth of STEM-based competitions, host a local social media information hub and share opportunities in our region. Their centerpiece is a new community-driven annual STEM-based competition with supporting events throughout the year.
